actions.text: Mr. Hayworth raised a point of order against the Stark amendment (A004). Mr. Hayworth stated that the content of the amendment was not germane to the resolution. The Chair sustained the point of order.

purpose: An amendment to add that it is the sense of Congress that, since the Task Force failed to develop a plan to ensure access of all Americans to affordable health care, the Congress should develop, pass and submit such a plan to the President prior to Augst 1. 1998.
